sources.title: Romance of the Limberlost
sources.description: A story set in the Limberlost region of Indiana in the year 1905. Jean Parker and Eric Linden are the stars.

sources.title: Romance of the Limberlost (1938) MELODRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Jean Parker, Eric Linden, Marjorie Main
Director: William Nigh

Deep in the swamplands of Indiana, pretty Laurie slaves away for her heartless Aunt Nora. The bright and optimistic girl falls in love with aspiring lawyer Wayne, but aunt puts an end to the romance by blackmailing the heartbroken Laurie into marrying Corson, the richest and most uncouth man in the county. Just before the ceremony, Corson is shot, and the girl's innocent friend, Chris, is arrested for the murder. Wayne's first case will be to save Chris from the gallows!

metadata.Plot: An orphaned girl is being raised in the Limberlost (timbered swamp in Indiana) by her aunt, who hates her because the girl's mother married the man that the aunt loved. The girl's existence is close to being servitude bondage, and her only companions are the birds and the animals of the forest. She meets and falls in love with a young man whose ambition is to be a lawyer. But her aunt is arranging for her to be married to the wealthiest man in the Limberlost, a drunken, coarse bully.
metadata.Actors: Jean Parker, Eric Linden, Marjorie Main
